text: The World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) is an organization created by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, in order to continue the development of the web, and its languages. Tim Berners-Lee also wants to make standards for the languages, and to improve them. As of 2 April 2010, the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) has 328 Members. As of 29 March 2012, the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) has 351 members. As of 9 June 2014, the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) has 384 Members. == References == == Other websites == *W3C - Homepage Category:Internet
title: World Wide Web Consortium
